meanings.definition: A person who delivers a eulogy.
meanings.sent1: During the funeral, the eulogizers shared heartfelt memories of the deceased.
meanings.sent2: The eulogizers spoke eloquently about the life of the departed.
meanings.sent3: The eulogizers tried to make the audience smile amidst the tears.
meanings.sent4: The eulogizers' words painted a beautiful picture of the person we lost.
meanings.sent5: The eulogizers' voices echoed in the somber hall, honoring the memory.

meanings.definition: Those who praise or extol someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The eulogizers at the award ceremony commended the winners for their achievements.
meanings.sent2: As eulogizers of nature, they marveled at the beauty of the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The eulogizers of the new restaurant couldn't stop raving about the food.
meanings.sent4: She became the eulogizer of his talents, always praising his work.
meanings.sent5: The eulogizers of the historical figure celebrated his legacy with passion.
